previewType.title: Type of preview
previewType.render: Rendered code (HTML, SVG and Markdown only)

gistInput.label: Please insert the Gist file ID or the file link on JdBEdit or Gist GitHub in the field below:

themesLabel: Code theme (applies if the file is not in HTML)

markdownInfo: The markdown is rendered as HTML and styled by default. To preserve the markdown code, select the "Plain Text" preview type above.
